title: THE THIRSTY PIRATE
desc: You drink. No arguments, just grog!

title: THE EXECUTIONER
desc: Pick a scallywag at the table. They must drink.

title: SHARING THE BOOTY
desc: Pick two people to cheers and drink together.

title: ALL HANDS ON DECK
desc: Everyone at the table takes a drink!

title: THE QUARTERMASTER
desc: The person with the emptiest glass drinks to catch up.

title: HIGH TIDE
desc: Everyone with a name starting with a vowel (A, E, I, O, U) drinks.

title: LOW TIDE
desc: Everyone with a name starting with a consonant drinks.

title: THE FIRST MATE
desc: Pick a partner. Whenever you drink, they drink (and vice versa) for 3 rounds.

title: THE POISON TASTER
desc: The person to your left must take a sip to ensure the crew is safe.

title: WATERFALL
desc: Everyone starts drinking. You can only stop when the person to your left stops. You go first!

title: BOTTOMS UP
desc: The person who most recently joined the group or entered the room drinks.

title: THE CAPTAIN’S HEALTH
desc: Everyone raises their glass, yells 'To the Captain!' and takes a sip.

title: LEFT-HANDED HOOK
desc: Everyone must drink with their non-dominant hand for the next 2 rounds.

title: DOUBLE VISION
desc: Take two sips, then pick someone else to take two sips.

title: THE DRUNKEN SAILOR
desc: Spin around 5 times and then try to take a sip without spilling a drop.

title: DRY SPELL
desc: The person who last went to the bathroom drinks.

title: EMPTY THE HOLD
desc: If your glass is more than half full, take a big gulp.

title: THE NAVIGATOR’S TOLL
desc: The person sitting furthest away from you drinks.

title: CATEGORIES
desc: Pick a category (e.g., Shoe Brands). Go around the circle; first to fail drinks.

title: QUESTION MASTER
desc: If anyone answers a question you ask, they drink. Lasts until the next flip.

title: NEVER HAVE I EVER
desc: 3 fingers up. Say something you've never done. Those who have done it drop a finger. First to 0 drinks.

title: THUMB MASTER
desc: At any point, put your thumb on the table. Last to follow drinks.

title: HEAVEN
desc: Point to the ceiling. Last person to do so drinks.

title: THE FLOOR IS LAVA
desc: Touch the floor. Last person to do so drinks.

title: MEDUSA
desc: On the count of 3, look at someone. If you make eye contact, you both drink.

title: VIKING
desc: Make a rowing motion. Last person to join the rowing drinks.

title: RHYME TIME
desc: Say a word. Go around the circle rhyming. First to fail drinks.

title: SNAKE EYES
desc: You cannot make eye contact with anyone. If you do, you both drink.

title: THE NARRATOR
desc: Narrate the person to your right's actions for 1 minute in a funny voice.

title: STARING CONTEST
desc: Challenge someone. First to blink drinks.

title: THE 7-GAME
desc: Count around the circle. If a number has a 7 or is a multiple of 7, say 'Arrr!'. Failure = drink.

title: FREEZE!
desc: At any random point, freeze in place. Last person to notice and freeze drinks.

title: CELEBRITY INITIALS
desc: Name a celebrity. The next person uses their last name's first letter to start a new name.

title: THE WHISPER
desc: Pass a secret message. If the last person says it wrong, everyone drinks.

title: THE SIREN’S CALL
desc: Make a sound. Everyone must repeat it louder. Last person to join drinks.

title: FACT OR FICTION
desc: Tell a story. If the group guesses wrong if it's true/false, they drink. If they are right, you drink.

title: THE RULE
desc: Make a new rule (e.g., 'No swearing'). Anyone who breaks it drinks.

title: WALK THE PLANK
desc: Stand on one leg for 20 seconds or take 3 sips.

title: PEG-LEG
desc: Keep one leg perfectly straight for the next 3 rounds. No bending!

title: SCRUB THE DECK
desc: Mimic scrubbing the floor for 15 seconds while humming a shanty.

title: THE PARROT
desc: Repeat the last 3 words of the person to your left for 2 minutes.

title: GHOST SHIP
desc: Total silence until your next turn. Drink if you break it.

title: EYE PATCH
desc: Keep one eye tightly closed for the next 5 minutes.

title: HOOK HAND
desc: Do not use your dominant hand for the next 2 rounds.

title: THE STATUE
desc: Stay perfectly still until someone laughs. If you move first, you drink.

title: PARLEY
desc: You may swap this current task with anyone else at the table.

title: ABANDON SHIP
desc: Everyone must switch seats. Last one down drinks.

title: THE LOOKOUT
desc: You must stand for the next 3 rounds to keep watch.

title: T-REX ARMS
desc: Tuck your hands into your armpits. Stay like this for 2 rounds.

title: THE MIME
desc: Act out a movie title without speaking. First to guess picks someone to drink.

title: THE ANCHOR
desc: You are anchored. You cannot move from your chair until the next 'Abandon Ship'.

title: FOREHEAD MASTER
desc: Stick a wet napkin to your forehead. Keep it there for 3 rounds.

title: ROBOT PIRATE
desc: Everything you say must be in a robot voice for 2 minutes.

title: THE MIRROR
desc: Pick someone. You must mimic every movement they make until your next turn.

title: THE DASHO
desc: Everyone must address you as 'Dasho'. If they forget, they drink.

title: EMA DATSHI TOLERANCE
desc: Name 5 different types of chilies found in Bhutan. 10 seconds!

title: THE ARCHERY PRO
desc: Pretend to aim a bow on one leg for 15 seconds. If you wobble, drink.

title: THIMPHU TRAFFIC LIGHT
desc: You control when people talk. If they speak without your 'green light', they drink.

title: DOMA HABIT
desc: The last person to say 'Kadrinche' (Thank you) drinks.

title: ZOW SHUNGO
desc: Name 5 Bhutanese dishes. First to repeat or fail drinks.

title: THE DZONGKHAG EXPERT
desc: Name 5 Dzongkhags in 10 seconds or take a sip for each you missed.

title: TSECHU DANCE
desc: Perform a 10-second mask dance. If no one joins, you drink alone.

title: THE NOSY AUNTIE
desc: Ask a personal question. If they refuse to answer, they drink.

title: HIGH PASS OXYGEN
desc: Hold your breath like you are at Dochula. First to exhale drinks.

title: SUJA TIME
desc: Pretend to churn butter. The last person to 'pour' a cup drinks.

title: PHALLUS PAINTER
desc: Sketch a lucky phallus on a napkin. Best artist picks someone to drink.

title: TAXI DRIVER
desc: Complain about Thimphu potholes for 30 seconds without stopping.

title: GHO/KIRA CHECK
desc: The person with the neatest clothes picks someone to drink.

title: PUNAKHA HEAT
desc: Act like it is 35 degrees. Fan yourself vigorously until the next turn.

title: THE PRAYER FLAG
desc: Flutter your arms like a flag whenever someone 'blows' (breathes) on you.
